# Cultivating educational innovation

Growing exceptional web apps for modern education

Plant the seeds of engaging, interactive learning experiences that
empower educators and students alike. Our studio provides the tools
you need to make assessments and credentialing seamless for all.

Trusted by students and educators worldwide

## Powerful Features

Experience exceptional educational apps

Our studio provides all the tools and features you need to create
engaging, interactive educational experiences for learners of all ages.

*   Interactive Learning: Share lesson plans to auto-generate assessments that improve knowledge retention.
*   Assessment Tools: Allow students to take assessments on their own time, receive real-time feedback and earn badges for their progress.
*   Adaptive Learning: Students receive instant feedback on their assessment progress and can re-take assessments to improve their score.
*   Collaborative Workspaces: Open your lessons to the public, or invite students to join your classes in a private roster.
*   Analytics Dashboard: Track student progress and identify areas for improvement with comprehensive analytics.
*   Premium Options: Create custom badges, unlock innovative lesson formats, advanced reports, and work with us to design curricula.

## Featured Project

A platform for teachers to create and share a fully automated but
customizable assessment and credentialing experience with their
students.

Ready to transform your educational experience?

Join students and educators worldwide who are building incredible
learning experiences with Beanpot Studio.
